title: Software Engineer
bullets: Designed and implemented a web app from start to finish using AngularJS, Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS.
Enhanced a production system's user interface with new features and improvements to augment operator workflows.
Added new capabilities to an existing Service-oriented Architecture (SOA) platform using Java.
Coordinated internal software releases among team members for testing, shrinking the gap between finding a bug and implementing a fix.
Engaged in meetings and scrums to gauge tasking priorities, ask questions, and offer suggestions for new features and improvements.

title: Student Associate
bullets: Contributed to a successful technical demonstration, resulting in additional funding for a project.
Developed a UI feature improvement in Javascript that enhanced the user friendliness of a system.
Prepared documentation and slides for various projects, of which one was made an internal standard for an SRI capability.
